body:
Comment 3: 
It's probably the same thing. The other timezone that's used in that test is -0600. What
happens is when the new time parser parses it, it checks if the time and timezone would
be a valid time in your local timezone. If it is then it sets the Time.loc to Local,
otherwise it uses a FixedZone. The test checks it with reflect.DeepEquals so even though
both values have the same effect, they are not the same as far as the test is concerned.
